input.sentences: during the parade | we saw people holding many interesting things which were hand-crafted .
there was a man wearing a big | silly chicken hat .
people in the parade were drumming sticks together with each other to make beautiful music .
some people in the parade even interacted with the spectators !
it was a very colorful event- with many goofy-looking | colorful hats and make-up !
output.sentences: The parade was full of a lot of people holding on to these floats.
In the parade the people held on tight to their sticks.
The parade also put on a nice show for the spectators.
This was definitely a hat goofy event.
